articles.content: Lil Durk scores his second No. 1 album on the Billboard 200 chart (dated March 26) as 7220 debuts in the top slot. The rapper previously topped the list with The Voice of the Heroes, a collaborative … [+7002 chars]

articles.title: ‘The Walking Dead’ star Norman Reedus returning to work following on set accident - Fox News
articles.description: Norman Reedus is returning to work on Tuesday, just about a week after he suffered a concussion while on set of “The Walking Dead”.
articles.content:
Norman Reedus is returning to work on Tuesday, just about a week after he suffered a concussion while on set of "The Walking Dead".
